summary: Alters the Elemental Protection perk within the block tree to make it block 90% damage from fire, frost and shock spells.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply edits the Elemental Protection perk that can be found within the Block perk tree and increases the amount of fire, frost and shock damage that it can mitigate when your shield is raised to 90% from the stock 50%.

This mod will be incompatible with any mod that edits the Elemental Protection perk.
author: Stndmunki
